1Ô∏è‚É£ Our Barcelona Campus is OPEN! Students have the option to study on site, but of course can keep studying remotely if they  wish. London & Berlin will open, local guidelines permitting, for our July course.‚Å£

We think transparency about student outcomes is super important, so here are ours for the last quarter. üîé

We're pleased to report we maintained our 100% hiring  rate (ALL our graduates were hired into technical positions), and increased the percentage of grads who secured a job offer within 30 days of graduating. üí™üí™üí™ Visit the Outcomes section on our website (link in bio) for all the details, including how we're leading the industry with our outcomes reporting.
